MODULE.name: GSL_SPF_TIMEOUTS
MODULE.description: Timeout configuration groups associated with the Graph \n

PARAMETER.name: PARAM_ID_SPF_TIMEOUTS
PARAMETER.description: Contains timeouts used for setting max wait times for responses or operations between GSL and SPF

CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Max wait time for SPF response, excluding the graph open command
CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: spf_timeout

CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Max wait time for SPF response to the graph open command
CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: graph_open_timeout

CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Max wait time for SPF response to the graph prepare command
CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: graph_prepare_timeout

CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Max wait time for start/stop operation completion
CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: graph_start_stop_timeout

CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Max wait time for read/write operation completion
CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: spf_read_write_timeout
